sentences.english: Gangs are buying assault weapons on the black market.
sentences.chinese: 黑帮总在黑市购置攻击性兵器。

sentences.english: Hages Andover's option to buying this property is gonna expire by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 银行对于这处房产的购置权月底就要失效了。

sentences.english: Before purchase should be thoughtful, and use to see from the problems.
sentences.chinese: 购置前应考虑周到，免除使用时才发现的困扰。

sentences.english: C:I want a new or a two-to-three-year old property.
sentences.chinese: 我是愿望购置新的或者二至三年楼龄的工业大厦。

sentences.english: There is an alternative which many small firms take. They buy microprocessors.
sentences.chinese: 很多小公司采用一种变通的办法，就是购置微处理机。

sentences.english: It pay to buy good machines. better quality usually means a higher price.
sentences.chinese: 购置好机器是合算的，质优通常意味着价高。

sentences.english: Others, who prefer convenience and privacy, set up fitness equipment in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 那些喜欢方便和隐私的人则自家购置了健身器材。

sentences.english: After dinner, all the family stays up late to welcome the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 在新年前夕，大家爱购置年货，米西年夜饭。

sentences.english: To Buy The Third Plant for an Official Mass Production of Resin Grinding Section Wheel.
sentences.chinese: 购置第三厂，正式量产树脂法磨片切片砂轮。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Mr. Alva acquired land for a factory.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，阿尔瓦为一座工厂购置了土地。

sentences.english: At auction the buyer bid and bought the wool for his mill.
sentences.chinese: 拍卖会上，买主竞价，为自己的工厂购置羊毛。

sentences.english: My company bought an old building, gave it a face-lift, and converted it to offices.
sentences.chinese: 我的公司购置了一幢旧房，整修后将它变成了办公楼。

sentences.english: They bought a new machine to print the posters.
sentences.chinese: 他们购置了新机器用来印海报。

sentences.english: Cut do not purchase a disharmonious furniture because of temporarily be seized by a whim.
sentences.chinese: 切不要因一时的心血来潮而购置一件不和谐的家具。

sentences.english: The funds will be used to support and purchase server and gifts.
sentences.chinese: 资金用于应援，服务器，礼物购置。

sentences.english: The preparation of platitudinous communication and information is essential for making the project of equipment purchase.
sentences.chinese: 设备购置计划要通过完整的招标体制来落实。

definition: to buy/to acquire/to add to one's possessions
to lease/to hire/to rent (sth from sb)
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to sell off/to get rid of in a sale
to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
to fund/to put money into sth/to invest
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/to get into bed/placement
